original_text: “When your son asks you in time to come, ‘What is the meaning of the testimonies and the statutes and the rules that the Lord our God has commanded you?’
korean_text: 후일에 네 아들이 네게 묻기를 우리 하나님 여호와께서 명령하신 증거와 규례와 법도가 무슨 뜻이냐 하거든

sentences.original_text: “When your son asks you in time to come,
‘What is the meaning of the testimonies and the statutes and the rules
that the Lord our God has commanded you?’
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명하신 것이냐 하면
